184980051.review:
High expectations for the game since everyone seems to like it. It's disappointing how little of the cool heist stuff you get to do in this game. You can't prepare or plan your heists beforehand. Stealth isn't required or rewarded. Often you can alert the guards and then just hide in the stairs until the guards lose interest. Cooperation is rarely needed, everyone can just run around and do their own thing. It's frustrating because there are times when you can plan and execute together. I did like the differences between the characters, even though some of them are far more useful than others.

There are other annoying mechanics as well. Collecting coins to get item charges. The perspective makes it sometimes difficult to tell which walls or objects will block a guards view and which ones will not. Same goes for the level design, none of the levels really feel unique. Everything looks the same from the top-down perspective.

The story tries to tie the heists together, but I didn't find it very interesting. I really wanted to like this game since heisting is fun, but unfortunately I didn't enjoy it very much.
